channel.title: [PI] Magic Book Tab help
channel.description:
When I hover my mouse over a spell in the magic book tab, it show the name of the spell, runes required, level required, and a description of the spell. Its all normal except it doesn't have the black background. I think the problem is in RSInterface, but I don't know where to start. Please reply if you need a picture to understand more of what I'm talking about.
Here is my RSInterface: [url=http://pastebin.com/GeqVZCT0]http://pastebin.com/GeqVZCT0[/url]

item.title: [PI] Magic Book Tab help

When I hover my mouse over a spell in the magic book tab, it show the name of the spell, runes required, level required, and a description of the spell.
